channel.title: Communication on Product Lead, Head of Design at buzzvil
channel.description: Recent content in Communication on Product Lead, Head of Design at buzzvil

item.title: Product leader @buzzvil
item.description: From January 2021, I took on a product leader role for our supply business. I lead a cross-disciplinary team of 10 members and I am in charge of the performances of our supply products interfaces (for App/Web Publishers).
